mapper.update: update register set price=ifnull(price,0)+200*(1-(cast(replace(discount,'%','') as decimal(18,2))/100)) where registerid=#{registerid}
mapper.select: select c.cid,r.userName,c.ctime,c.content from checkup c,register r where c.registerid=r.registerid and r.registerid=#{registerid} order by c.ctime desc
